Utility method returning the default light account factory address given a Chain object

## Import

```ts
import { getDefaultLightAccountFactoryAddress } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### chain

`Chain`

- a Chain object

### version

`LightAccountVersion`

- the version of the light account to get the factory address for

## Returns

`Address`
address for the given chain
